summary: Xavier Lombard is a world-weary private eye in London, in exile from his native Paris; his best friend is Nathalie, a high-class call girl. He gets a call from an old friend from the Paris ... See full summary »
cast: Daniel Auteuil|Nastassja Kinski|Katrin Cartlidge|Marianne Denicourt|Ciarán Hinds|Billie Whitelaw|Cyril Shaps|Bruce Greenwood|Jamie Harris|Hemal Pandya|Billy Smyth|Michael Liebmann|Cal MacAninch|Mark Benton|Joe White|Natalie Rogers|Charlotte Carew-Gibbs|Gregory McFarnon|Marsha Fitzalan|Will Welch|Ray MacAllan|David Hayman|Christine Perez|Júlio Garcia|Mem Ferda|Anneka Svenska
title: Inocencia robada
